1.content:
"Gee, thanks for bringing me along daddy" said Phantasma as her and her father made their way to Castle Dracula. "Well I couldn't very well

leave you at home by yourself" replied Phantom as they continued to fly across the Transylvania sky. "Especially after that incident at Crystal

Lake". They saw Count Dracula's castle straight ahead and prepared to land. As they landed Phanty couldn't help but take in all of the Gothic

scenery of the castle and the grounds that surrounded it. "Wow, fancy" she said out loud. "Indeed" replied Phantom. "Now I want you to be on

your best behavior while we're here. Dracula is a very close friend and I don't want you to do anything to embarrass me, understand"? he said

firmly. "Yes daddy" she said rolling her eyes (without him noticing of course). Phantom knocked loudly on the door. After a short wait the door

creaked open and they were met by one of Dracula's many servants. "Ah, hello and good afternoon Mr. Phantom, we have been expecting

you. Please come in" said the small and shrill man. They made their way into the main corridor and were greeted by the man they (or at least

Phantom) had come to see. "Phantom! You transparent bastard, it's good to see you" said Dracula jokingly as he made his way over to

Phantom to give him a hug. "Good to see you to you sorry sack of flesh" replied Phantom sarcastically as the two hugged and began

reminiscing. 'Sheesh, and he's worried about ME embarrassing HIM' thought Phanty to herself. "My Phantasma, how you've grown" said

Dracula breaking her train of thought. "You're growing into such a beautiful young woman". "Thank you sir" she replied politely. "Sibella is in her

room and Alucard is out by the garden if you wish to see them" Dracula continued. "Oh that would be great sir, thank you" she replied.

"Excellent, Egor"! He shouted, calling upon another one of his servants. A deformed looking man made his way over to them. "Yes sire"

replied the man with a bow. "Escort Ms. Phantasma anywhere she wishes to go so Phantom and I can discuss business" said Dracula. "As

you wish sire" replied Egor with another bow. "Where would you like to go Ms. Phantasma"?
1.title: Phantoms in Transylvania

11.content:
Egor I would like to go the visit Sibella Phantasma said

Very well Egor replied, right this way.

Egor leads her to the top of the stair well and leads her to a room that has Sibella's name engraved on it.

Phantasma knocks on the door and hear Sibella asking her to come in.

Sibella Phantasma rejoice

Phantasma so good to see you Sibella said.

So Phanty what would you like to do.
11.title: Visit Sibella

111.content:
Oh Sibella you always know how to have fun Phanty said.

Well we ought to we have known each other for quite some time.

Outside of the room Maybe I should tell the young master of the good news Egor thought.

He went to Alacard's room and told him a special person is here.

Alacard knocked on his sister's door and was told he could come in.

He takes one step and finds his sister and her friend getting their nails done.

Girls he thought
111.title: hang out

1111.content:
Phantasma my dear would you like to go dancing in the ball room. Alacard asked

Dancing that sounds like a blast Phantasma rejoiced.

She began laughing like her usual self.

unlike his usual self Alacard smiled as well.

They went down stairs into the ball room where Igor was playing music to accompanying them.

The began with a slow dance and worked up to something fast paced to the point of them really getting into it.

Once they were finished the cleaned themselves up and decided.
1111.title: lure Phanty out

12.content:
phanty saw Alucard sitting on a chair on the back patio of the house, then alucard put his nose to the sky and smiled.
"well, well, well, if it isn't transpartently beuitful phanty, come to visit me. I'm not sure to be happy or honored." he said getting up and turning to face her and hold out his hand. with a smile on her face Phanty went to him and placing her hand in his she noticed how different they looked but liked them and made a comment about. "we are so different, but so much the same."

"it is our differences that make us who we are." he replied and phanty realizsed that they were slowly turning and dance they broke apart when igor cogued a little bit. and blush phanty saying something about...
12.title: Seeing Alucard Again

choices: Phanty wants know more about Hypon
Dracula leaves her and goes up to Hypon
13.content: Then all of a sudden, interupting Phantasa's Train of thought again. There was a voice, but no one to be seen. Then a black mist appeared then a Bat. ???: Uncle! I bring horrible news. Dracula: Hypon, my nephew, what has happened? Hypon: (holding back the tears) He killed..... My parents. Dracula: Who? Hypon: The Black Hand Leader. Dracula: Satan? Hypon: (Nods and then crys and heads upstairs to his room when he spends the night and they heard so many screams of anger, pain, and sadness.
13.title: A Family Crisis

choices: Sibella sees Phanty enter and she follows
132.content: Phantasma when to Hypon's Door and knocked, Hypon quieted down and opened the door. Hypon: Hello, are you Aculrad's and Sibella's Friend? Phantasma nodded and asked, "Do you mind if I talk to you about you?" Hypon was shocked but nodded and said, Come in, Come in, We can talk if you like. Hypon went in his room and Phanty saw Hypon had a Wolf's Tail.
132.title: Phanty wants know more about Hypon

info.brief_description: Alucard Dracula's Son searches for answers about himself as he finds love along the way
info.description:
This story takes place between Jason at Ghoul School 2.5 :Summer Break http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1835239-Jason-at-Ghoul-School-25-Su... and
Jason at Ghoul School 3:Monsters of Rock http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1840924-Jason-at-Ghoul-school-3Mons... Both of which are owned by major allen. Check out his portfolio for more Ghoul School related interactives. This story revolves around Alucard (Son of Dracula) as he struggles with finding himself and what he wants out of life. As he does this, he continues plotting with his rebellion group The Black Hand, against Satan and his forces. In the midst of all this however he finds love in the form of one the ghoul school girls, Phantasma aka Phanty (Daughter of Phantom of the Opera) as her and her father visit Tranylvania during the Summer Break. What will possibly happen? Read, Add, and Enjoy!

1. If you're going to add, use good grammar.

2. I can't stress this last part enough. NO SHORT, ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS! They WILL be DELETED! Put some thought, time, and effort into your work. Thank you
